x.description:
x
The x shift in blocks
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128

y.description:
y
The y shift in blocks
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128

yRandom.description:
yRandom
Adds an additional amount of height randomly (translateY + rand(0 - yRandom))
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128

z.description:
z
The z shift in blocks
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0
* Minimum allowed is -128
* Maximum allowed is 128
